parallel

Class BoundedBufferArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • parallel.BoundedBufferArray

  • public class BoundedBufferArray
extends java.lang.Object
    a bounded-length FIFO buffer implemented as an Object Array. It's meant to be used as a (faster) replacement for Vector structures in XXXMsgPassingCoordinator family of classes.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011

    Company:

      return the datum at position i.
      java.lang.Object remove()
      remove the first object that was inserted in the buffer.
      int size()
      returns the current total number of objects in the buffer.
